wikipedia_page.main: Phillipa Mary Towler-Green (born 11 May 1984 in Lambeth, London) is a former competitive English ice dancer.

With his second partner, Charlotte Clements, Poole became the 2002 British bronze medalist on the senior level. The following year he teamed up with Phillipa Towler-Green and was coached by former World Champion, Diane Towler. Poole and Towler-Green were the 2005-2008 British silver medalists and the 2004 Nebelhorn Trophy bronze medalists.
* Phillipa Towler-Green & Phillip Poole - Official website
Diane Towler-Green was born 16 December 1946 in Kensington, London. She is the mother of ice dancers Candice Towler-Green and Phillipa Towler-Green, and the aunt of Mark Bosley.
* Phillipa Towler-Green / Phillip Poole, both British Junior champions and world competitors
| 2002 ||  Pamela O'Connor / Jonathan O'Dougherty ||  Phillipa Towler-Green / Robert Burgerman ||  Marina Timofeieva / Evgeni Striganov ||
She is the twin sister of Phillipa Towler-Green and the daughter of Diane Towler, who also coached her.
